alert.note: Alert for Menifee; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Morgan, eastern Menifee and north central Wolfe Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Korea, or near Frenchburg, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wellington, Artville and Korea around 635 PM EDT. Ebon around 640 PM EDT. Pomeroyton, Kellacey and Zag around 645 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stoll, Ezel, Omer, Dehart, Henry, Pekin, Maytown, New Cummer, Woodsbend, Valeria and Twentysix. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
